msg: ZOOKEEPER-1109. Zookeeper service is down when SyncRequestProcessor meets any exception. (Laxman via mahadev)

author: marvin
msg: Now that we use the shell for mkdir/rmdir, the rest of the content of the Dir
module belongs in the DirManip probe module.

author: marvin
msg: Use the shell for mkdir and rmdir.
We have previously compiled our own _charm_mkdir and _charm_rmdir utilities on
the fly because we cannot know in advance what the compiler provides.  After
this patch, we rely on the shell instead.
